FOUNDRYBANK.NoActor: This token has no associated actor.
FOUNDRYBANK.NoAccounts: No accounts found. Create your first account to get started.
FOUNDRYBANK.SelectAccount: Select an account to view details
FOUNDRYBANK.ConfirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete the account '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
FOUNDRYBANK.CannotDeleteNonZeroBalance: Cannot delete account with non-zero balance

DefaultCurrency.Name: Default Currency
DefaultCurrency.Hint: The default currency type for new bank accounts

EnableLogging.Name: Enable Transaction Logging
EnableLogging.Hint: Enable automatic logging of all banking transactions

TransactionHistoryLimit.Name: Transaction History Limit
TransactionHistoryLimit.Hint: Maximum number of transactions to keep in history per account

EnableShiftClick.Name: Enable Shift+Click to Open Bank
EnableShiftClick.Hint: Allow opening bank dialog by holding Shift and clicking on a token

InterestRate.Name: Annual Interest Rate
InterestRate.Hint: Annual interest rate for deposits (0.00 to 0.50 = 0% to 50%)

EnableInterest.Name: Enable Interest on Deposits
EnableInterest.Hint: Enable automatic interest calculation on bank deposits

EnableDnd5eSync.Name: Enable D&D 5e Currency Sync
EnableDnd5eSync.Hint: Sync bank accounts with D&D 5e character currency (pp, gp, ep, sp, cp)

EconomicGrowthRate.Name: Economic Growth Rate
EconomicGrowthRate.Hint: Economic growth rate (-1.0 to 1.0). Affects interest rates and stock prices
